title: PS5 Pro Incoming?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.09.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.

Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.

PlayStation’s holding a presentation tomorrow, Sony’s quietly increased the Dualsense price, and Bungie’s new roadmap for Destiny.

On Friday September 13th Organization 13 takes over the Kinda Funny Spare Bedroom and only one man and his friends have the keys and friendships to take it back! Mike, Ricky, Kyrie, and Sora return for Mike’s epic journey into Kingdom Hearts with the start of Kingdom Hearts 2. Tune in to the marathon stream starting after gamescast on Friday exclusively on Twitch!! (YouTube upload later) Help make Andy share the Paopu Fruit with Mike to seal their friendship FOREVER.
Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - is a about video game tattoos with Lisa Wallen
The STREAM is Dark Souls But Andy and Lisa Wallen SHARE ONE CONTROLLER
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
